title: How come
body:
When you want to try and walk through the minion wave, your champ hikes around them with a 50km radius. But when the enemy champion goes all in on you, they are RIGHT SMACK BANG on top of your model, so much so that you cant even aim a skill shot properly because it just goes right over them. 

Why? Why are there different rules for unit collision?

Surely if minions have an invisible forcefield around them, then you should too and Yasuo shouldn't be able to stand on your face while all your skillshots sail right over him. OR, If Lee Sin can dance a jig directly on your face, then shouldn't you be able to at least squeeze between two minions without being snared while your champion spazzes out for a few seconds?
Why have different rules for different things?


Clarity man... Clarity.

replies.body:
how come unit collision is ridiculous
how come when it wasnt ridiculous riot decided that minions are people too
